value.title: Troubleshoot missing applied filters in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you ever seen that a visual is being filtered and you can't find where that filter is? Whether it has happened to you yet or not, make sure you check this video so you know how to fix it when if happens. #curbal #powerbi  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Update Power BI Desktop automatically
